1004.name: ErrResetMeshconfigCode
1004.probable_cause: Meshery server config file is not reset to default settings
1004.suggested_remediation: Verify Meshery server config file is reset to default settings by executing `mesheryctl system context view`

1010.name: ErrNoAdaptersCode
1010.long_description: Adapter for required mesh not found
1010.short_description: Adapter for required mesh not found
1010.suggested_remediation: Deploy the proper Meshery Adapter for your service mesh

1013.name: ErrCreatingDeployResponseRequestCode
1013.short_description: Error creating request for deploy response

1016.name: ErrTimeoutWaitingForDeployResponseCode
1016.short_description: Timed out waiting for deploy event
1016.suggested_remediation: Check your environment and try again

1017.name: ErrFailedDeployingMeshCode
1017.long_description: Failed to deploy the service mesh
1017.short_description: Failed to deploy the service mesh
1017.suggested_remediation: Check your environment and try again

1019.name: ErrCreatingValidateResponseRequestCode
1019.short_description: Error creating request for validate response

1020.name: ErrTimeoutWaitingForValidateResponseCode
1020.long_description: Timed out waiting for validate response
1020.short_description: Timed out waiting for validate response
1020.suggested_remediation: Check your environment and try again

1022.name: ErrRetrievingCurrentContextCode
1022.probable_cause: current context is not retrieved successfully
1022.suggested_remediation: Verify current context is retrieved successfully and valid

1023.name: ErrSettingTemporaryContextCode
1023.probable_cause: temporary context is not set properly
1023.suggested_remediation: Verify the temporary context is set properly using the -c flag provided

1024.name: ErrCreateManifestsFolderCode
1024.probable_cause: system error in creating manifest folder
1024.suggested_remediation: Make sure manifest folder (.meshery/manifests) is created properly

1025.name: ErrProcessingMctlConfigCode
1025.probable_cause: Error due to invalid format of Mesheryctl config
1025.suggested_remediation: Make sure Mesheryctl config is in correct format and valid
